title: 'Our Thing' Podcast Season 5 Episode 4: “The Last Conversation I Had With John Gotti.”
description: Sammy talks about his time in the witness protection program and all of the tribulations that happen during his time as ‘Jimmy Moran.’ He goes into detail about his last conversation with John Gotti.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy talks about his time in the witness protection program and all of the tribulations that happen during his time as ‘Jimmy Moran.’ He goes into detail about his last conversation with John Gotti.
itunes:summary: Sammy talks about his time in the witness protection program and all of the tribulations that happen during his time as ‘Jimmy Moran.’ He goes into detail about his last conversation with John Gotti.
